ai-patthana21.17:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, sometimes the top of the Dhamma is given to him:
ai-patthana21.17:1.1_0: You shouldn’t give rise to pleasant feeling with painful feeling,
ai-patthana21.17:1.1_1: You don’t give rise to pleasant feeling with painful feeling.
ai-patthana21.17:1.1_2: You shouldn’t give rise to pleasant feeling with painful feelings, or with a reason,
ai-patthana21.17:1.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.17:2.1_0: not with the root of unpleasant feeling rooted in the three roots,
ai-patthana21.17:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.17:2.1_3: There is no result for you,
ai-patthana21.17:3.1_0: You don’t give rise to pleasant feeling with painful feeling.
ai-patthana21.17:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
